name: Greg

welcomeHeading.part4: full-stack developer who loves creating engaging and innovative experiences for brands and their customers.

quote.part2: code ensures they reach their destination.

contactMessage.part1: Want to work together or have a question?
contactMessage.part2: Reach out. I'm always open for a chat.

funFact.label: *** Fun fact ***
funFact.message: I created this portfolio in React, Vite and Typescript. You can find the project on my GitHub page.

projectCardRecycMontreal.name: Recyc-Montréal
projectCardRecycMontreal.description: An app that simplifies your waste management by allowing you to easily find collection days for your address.

projectCardEcoleEnFolie.name: École en folie
projectCardEcoleEnFolie.description: A subscription-based service allowing access to a bank of French and Math exercies for elementary education.

projectWarning: Please get in touch with me for details about this project.

aboutMe.workflowText: No two projects are alike, but here's a glimpse into my usual approach. It's a blend of strategy, intuition, and passion.

empathy.heading: User Research
empathy.text: It all starts with understanding the users. What do they love? What frustrates them? I talk to them, run surveys, and create user personas to get a clear picture.

analysis.heading: Problem Identification & Analysis
analysis.text: Next, it's time to connect the dots. I pinpoint the problem, dig into the root causes, and analyze the details to find the best solution.

concept.heading: Ideation & Concept Development
concept.text: This is where I unleash my creativity and let ideas take flight! I brainstorm, sketch, make UML charts, and map out ideas. It's all about shaping the vision with fresh inspiration.

prototyping.heading: Prototyping
prototyping.text: I turn ideas into wireframes, stubs, and prototypes. It's trial and error until everything feels just right, proving the concept along the way.

feedback.heading: User Testing & Feedback
feedback.text: Testing time! I don't just run a test protocol—I share the design with my team and users, gathering their insights to make sure it's user-friendly and intuitive.

refinement.heading: Iteration & Refinement
refinement.text: With feedback in hand, I tweak the design or code. Then it's back to testing to ensure everything is seamless and cohesive.

implementation.heading: Final Design Implementation
implementation.text: This is where it all comes together. I make sure it's sleek, functional, and ready to make an impact.

postLaunch.heading: Post-Launch Analysis
postLaunch.text: After launch, the work isn't over! I dive into analytics and user reviews to learn, optimize, and plan for future improvements.

attribution.becris: Some flaticons were created by Becris
